org.apache.james.container.spring.lifecycle

Interface ConfigurationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationProviderImpl, OSGIConfigurationProvider

    public interface ConfigurationProvider
    Load HierarchicalConfiguration for beans

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.commons.configuration.HierarchicalConfiguration getConfiguration(String beanName)
      Load and return the configuration for the bean with the given name.
      void registerConfiguration(String beanName, org.apache.commons.configuration.HierarchicalConfiguration conf)
      Register a HierarchicalConfiguration for a bean name.
      It is not mandatory to use the registerConfiguration to have the configuration available as the getConfiguration(String) method may load it based on conventions (naming,...).

    • Method Detail

      • registerConfiguration

        void registerConfiguration(String beanName,
                         org.apache.commons.configuration.HierarchicalConfiguration conf)
        Register a HierarchicalConfiguration for a bean name.
        It is not mandatory to use the registerConfiguration to have the configuration available as the getConfiguration(String) method may load it based on conventions (naming,...).
        Parameters:
        beanName - The bean name for which the configuration has to be registered.
        conf - The hierarchical configuration to register for the bean name.

      • getConfiguration

        org.apache.commons.configuration.HierarchicalConfiguration getConfiguration(String beanName)
                                                                            throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Load and return the configuration for the bean with the given name. The configuration may already be loaded from a previous method invocation or from a previous configuration registration via the registerConfiguration(String, HierarchicalConfiguration).
        This method may implement convention based configuration loading based on naming,...
        Parameters:
        beanName -
        Returns:
        config
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
